item.title: matrix lava
item.author: trishores@gmail.com

item.title: Glow IDE
item.author: trishores@gmail.com
item.description: Microsoft’s free cross-platform open-source Visual Studio Code editor together with the free open-source Glow IDE extension provides an all-in-one editor, compiler, and simulator to create and view animations.

item.title: Glowscript
item.author: trishores@gmail.com
item.description: Glowscript is a simple yet powerful asynchronous multithreaded procedural programming language for creating multilayered (superimposed) animations on smart LED strips, such as DotStars and NeoPixels.

item.title: Glow OS
item.author: trishores@gmail.com
item.description: Glow operating system, written in C, is optimized for embedded devices driving smart LED strips.

item.title: bicycle rear light
item.author: trishores@gmail.com
item.description: This animation uses 4 threads: 1 for launch and 1 for each LED ring. Full-on and side-mounted LEDS on the Elektra LED development board provide a wide viewing angle for this animation.  Glowscript: // DEVICE (modify with care)   // Elektra simulator device:name='simulator-elektra-20' device:type='sim' device:tickIntervalMillisecs='50'// increase to reduce CPU load. device:protocolVersion='1.0' device:ledCount='20' device:ramSpaceBytes='25000'// set an animation size limit in memory. device:romSpaceBytes='200000'// set an animation size limit on disk.

item.title: bicycle turn signal
item.author: trishores@gmail.com

item.title: lightbeam over lava
item.author: trishores@gmail.com
item.description: This animation uses 50 threads: 1 for launch, 4 for the lava background, and 45 for the lightbeam overlay. The lightbeam overlay has the highest z-order to make it topmost.  Glowscript: // DEVICE (modify with care)   // Elektra simulator device:name='simulator-elektra-20' device:type='sim' device:tickIntervalMillisecs='50'// increase to reduce CPU load. device:protocolVersion='1.0' device:ledCount='20' device:ramSpaceBytes='25000'// set an animation size limit in memory. device:romSpaceBytes='200000'// set an animation size limit on disk.

item.title: simple beacon
item.author: trishores@gmail.com

item.title: spinner
item.author: trishores@gmail.com

item.title: Hardware
item.author: trishores@gmail.com
item.description: Run animations on your own smart LED device using the Elektra LED development board powered by an ARM Cortex microcontroller.
